name: random-form-filler
description: Chrome extension that automatically fills web forms with random data

scripts.version: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-manifest
scripts.update-manifest: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const manifest=require('./extension/manifest.json'); manifest.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./extension/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"
